jobInfo.postDescription:
工作时间灵活，部分时间可远程办公，面试考察英语

Key Responsibilities:
Develop and execute test cases for software applications.
Perform hands-on testing, including functional, regression, and performance testing.
Collaborate with development teams to identify and resolve defects.
Prepare and maintain detailed testing documentation.
Communicate test results and feedback to clients and internal teams in English.
Work closely with project managers to ensure testing milestones are met.
Continuously improve testing processes and strategies.
Requirements:
Proficiency in English; ability to discuss and negotiate with international clients in English.
1+ years of experience in software testing.
Ability to work independently as well as in a team environment.
Knowledge of software development life cycle and testing methodologies.
Familiarity with testing tools and automation frameworks is a plus.
Flexibility to work afternoon to midnight shifts.
jobInfo.address: 北京海淀区睿剑科技(北京)有限公司金隅智造工场N5栋F1+1206
showSkills: 掌握软件测试理论和流程

brandComInfo.introduce:
睿剑科技（北京）有限公司是一家领先的软件测试和质量保证公司，十多年来持续为北美、欧洲和亚洲的各个行业客户提供高质量的软件测试服务，客户既有财富500强企业，也有小规模的独立软件开发商，业务广泛涉及于游戏、金融、互联网、医药及教育等各大行业。
• 与客户及员工保持多年的长期合作关系；
• 专业的软件质量保证技术，覆盖所有平台；
• 丰富的行业知识背景，涵盖了金融和医药等专业领域。

       睿剑科技的软件质量保证流程是您软件的最佳实践过程中的信心源泉，是提升用户体验的坚强后盾。

全面的质量保证和测试服务 质量保证咨询服务
• 自动化测试
• 功能测试
• 性能测试 
• 安全测试
• 可用性测试 
• 敏捷测试
• 接口测试 
• 独立的测试服务

软件测试工具
经过十多年的经营，我们在以下方面拥有深入的专业知识和丰富的实践经验：
